common.welcome: 👋 Welcome to the Trading Bot! Please choose an option:
common.no_wallet: ❌ No wallet registered. You can create one or restore it.
common.show_full_key_private_only: 🔑 Your private key (masked): {{masked}} To view the full key, open a private chat with the bot and press the button below.
common.restore_prompt_private: 🔑 Please send your wallet private key now in a private message (it will be received here).
common.reveal_private_only: ❌ For your safety, full private keys can only be revealed in a private chat. Open a private chat with the bot and try again.
common.wallet_restored_success: ✅ Wallet restored successfully! Address: {{address}} Private key (keep it safe): {{secret}}
common.restore_failed_invalid: ❌ Failed to restore wallet. Invalid key. Try again or create a new wallet.
common.error_processing_results: ❌ Error processing results. Check server logs.
common.error_fetching_mints: ❌ Error fetching mints. Check server logs.

strategy.setup_intro:
🚦 Strategy Setup:
Please enter the required value for each field. Send "skip" to skip any optional field.

main.show_tokens_help: To view tokens matching your strategy, use the /show_token command.
main.invite_friends_msg:
🤝 Share this link to invite your friends:
{{link}}
main.no_tokens_match: No tokens currently match your strategy.
main.notifications_sent: ✅ Notification sent for tokens matching your strategy.

commands.set_mints_usage: Usage: /set_mints <N> — set the number of mints you want returned when pressing Sniper (example: /set_mints 3)
commands.invalid_number: Please enter a valid number between 1 and 20.
commands.mints_set: ✅ Number of mints set to {{n}}. Press Sniper to see the latest {{n}} fresh mints.
commands.provide_private_key: ❗ Please provide the private key after the command. Example: /restore_wallet <secret>

common_extra.no_strategy_or_wallet: ❌ You must set a strategy first using /strategy

buy.invalid_buy_amount: ❌ Your strategy does not have a valid buy amount configured. Please set `buyAmount` in your strategy or use the Settings to configure the buy amount before using the Buy button.
buy.success:
Token bought successfully!
Auto-sell order placed for profit target {{percent}}%.
Check your orders with /pending_sells
buy.failed_tx: Buy failed: Transaction was not completed.

sell.selling_token: 🔻 Selling token: {{token}} with {{percent}}% of your balance ({{balance}}) ...
sell.failed_tx: Sell failed: Transaction was not completed.

wallet_msgs.no_wallet_found: ❌ No wallet found for this user.
wallet_msgs.wallet_created_success: ✅ Wallet created successfully! Address: {{address}} Private key (keep it safe): {{secret}}

cex.prompt_enter_keys: Please send your CEX APIKEY and SECRET (format: APIKEY:SECRET). {{have}} {{after}}
cex.private_chat_required: Please open a private chat with the bot to manage API keys.
cex.no_keys_saved: No API keys saved. Press the Change Keys button to add keys.
cex.choose_request_action: Choose an action for token requests:
cex.analysis_received: Analysis request received for {{symbol}}. Running analysis...
cex.analysis_no_results: Failed to get analysis results before execution.
cex.prompt_send_token: Send the token symbol or address to analyze (example: BTC/USDT).
cex.prompt_send_trade: Send trade request details (symbol/pair and params).
cex.advice_trend_bull: Trend is bullish on the selected timeframe.
cex.advice_rsi_high: RSI high — consider risk of short-term pullback.
cex.advice_high_volatility: High volatility detected; prefer smaller position sizes.
cex.advice_trend_bear: Trend is bearish. Prefer wait-or-short strategies.
cex.advice_mixed: Market mixed: consider waiting for clearer confirmation or use reduced size.
cex.advice_volume_high: Volume is above recent average — move has momentum.
cex.advice_volume_low: Volume is well below recent average — move lacks conviction.
cex.re_ex_no_setup: No clear setup — consider waiting or reducing size
cex.analysis_symbol_not_found:
Symbol {{symbol}} not found on exchange or invalid symbol. Error: {{err}}
Try sending the correct pair (e.g. BTC/USDT) or a contract address.
cex.live_enabled: Live trading mode enabled (orders are still disabled until fully implemented).
cex.live_confirm_needed: Please confirm to enable live trading.
cex.received_partial_key: ✅ Received API key. Now send the SECRET in one message, or send APIKEY:SECRET directly.
cex.api_keys_saved: ✅ Your API keys have been saved (encrypted).
cex.no_pending_confirm: ℹ️ No pending API keys to confirm.
cex.no_pending_cancel: ℹ️ No pending API keys to cancel.
cex.invalid_test_format: ❌ Invalid TEST format. Use TEST:APIKEY:SECRET or TEST:PLATFORM:APIKEY:SECRET
cex.invalid_format: ❌ Invalid format. Use APIKEY:SECRET or PLATFORM:APIKEY:SECRET
cex.not_expecting_keys: ℹ️ I was not expecting CEX keys right now. Press the CEX Sniper button first to start the key setup.
cex.test_not_implemented: ℹ️ TEST for platform {{platform}} is not implemented. Keys look syntactically valid; no validation performed.
cex.key_validation_success:
✅ Key validation succeeded. USDT balance: free={{free}}, locked={{locked}}
Account permissions: {{permissions}}
cex.already_have_keys: ⚠️ You already have API keys saved. Reply with CONFIRM to overwrite or CANCEL to discard the new keys. (Platform: {{platform}})
cex.key_validation_failed:
❌ Key validation failed: {{err}}
Please check your keys and try again.

sniper.no_mints: ℹ️ No fresh mints were found in both attempts. The network may be quiet or RPC limits applied. Try again later or increase RUNNER_TIMEOUT_MS.
sniper.retrying: ℹ️ No immediate mints found — retrying with a longer timeout.
sniper.collect_func_missing: ⚠️ Internal error: collectFreshMints function is not available on the server.
